name: Imilab
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
by the skill, you can control the imilab camera.
Instructions for use:
1.Click "ENABLE TO USE" in skills.
2.Use imilab account (Register an imilab account in the imilab app) authorization login in imilab login page.
3.After logging in successfully, you can say to your alexa: "Discover device";After waiting for 45 seconds, the device list in your imilab app will be synchronized to the alexa app.
4.After discovering the device successfully, you can say to alexa: "show me the camera1 (the name of your camera)", and then alexa with a screen speaker can play the video of the camera; during the video playback, you can say to alexa ："Alexa close" to close the video playback.
